title: installer not working
body: hi, i got a new pc two days ago as you do and tried to download client (which i can do successfully) but its when the client opens and starts installing the full 5G game that it seems to just stop, its not like other peoples post were it stops at a specific %. My installer which ive tried re-downloading and installing multiple times stops just whenever it wants, sometimes first stage 17% sometimes 2nd stage 85%............HELP!?!?

replies.body: What OS are you installing League into and which ISP are you with?
